articles.title: Half-Life 2 RTX and all of its foggy, ray-traced lighting is getting a demo next week - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: The long awaited Half-Life 2 RTX mod still doesn't have a release date, but it is getting a demo so you can try it for yourself soon.

articles.title: Google rolling out latest Gemini 2.0 models, free Deep Research to Android, iOS - 9to5Google
articles.description: Google has widely rolled out the latest Gemini models, like 2.0 Flash Thinking (experimental), to the web, Android, and iOS apps.

articles.title: Valve’s Promise Comes True With SteamOS 3.7.0 Preview: Offers Support To Non-Steam Deck Handhelds And Plasma 6 For Linux Desktop-Like Experience - Wccftech
articles.description: Valve has released the SteamOS 3.7.0 Preview for Steam Deck, offering several major and minor improvements, including Plasma update from 5 to 6.
